# Data input and output

## CSV

create a sample csv file:

```{r}
if (!dir.exists("data")){
    dir.create("data")
}
if (!file.exists("data/my_example.csv")){
    write.csv(mtcars, file = "data/my_example.csv")
}
```

### read CSV

```{r}
data <- read.csv("data/my_example.csv")
head(data, 3)
```

The imported data is a dataframe 

```{r}
class(data)
```
